cont.entity_a: Marvel chipset bug causes Wi-Fi network crashes with patched Android devices. Router stops broadcasting on 2.4 GHz and requires frequent reboots. 5GHz radio has constant instability issues requiring restarts. Device requires frequent reboots to maintain Wi-Fi connectivity. Router firmware update caused frequent Wi-Fi dropouts.
cont.entity_b: Router is extremely stable with fantastic range. Router provides fast download and upload speeds with Comcast. Router is fast, reliable, and supports multiple wireless devices. Router handles high traffic without slowing down. Router works well with Xbox Live and provides stable connections.

cont.entity_a: Easily modify firmware for VPN setup, offering economical alternatives to expensive routers. The router supports OpenWRT/LEDE and DD-WRT for advanced customization. OpenWRT firmware installation is easy and customizable. Router requires disabling VPN temporarily for setup. Router firmware lacks advanced customization features.
cont.entity_b: Router has advanced settings for prioritizing network traffic. Router requires firmware adjustments for optimal Xbox Live performance.

cont.entity_a: Web interface is easy to navigate. Setup wizard can be problematic; web interface setup is recommended.
cont.entity_b: Router interface is user-friendly with gigabit switch.

cont.entity_a: Router provides excellent Wi-Fi coverage and speed. Router has a strong signal range and improves speeds.
cont.entity_b: Router is extremely stable with fantastic range.

cont.entity_a: Linksys customer support is responsive and provides replacements.
cont.entity_b: Technical support is available via email.

cont.entity_a: Router runs hot and emits an odor. Router is prone to overheating due to lack of a cooling fan.
cont.entity_b: Device overheats when stacked under another device.

cont.entity_a: Router is not suitable for plug and play; requires technical knowledge for troubleshooting.
cont.entity_b: Router setup is easy and reliable with no downtime. Router setup is straightforward with minimal configuration required.

cont.entity_a: Router is suitable for high bandwidth usage with multiple devices.
cont.entity_b: Works well with X-Box Live and Nintendo Wi-Fi after firmware upgrade. Router works great with multiple gaming consoles and streaming devices. GameFuel feature supports VOIP nicely. Router is suitable for gaming with low latency. Router is recommended for gaming and high-speed internet use.
Supports stronger Wi-Fi encryption for secure access.
Router is reliable for both PC and Mac with easy setup.
Router supports multiple wireless standards and devices.
